text: (avarkal virumpukinravaru) meyyakave nam avarkalitam vanavarkalai irakkivaittalum, irantavarkalai (eluppi) avarkalitam pecumpatic ceytalum, (maraivayirukkum) anaittaiyum avarkal (kan) mun kontu vantu certtalum avarkal nampikkai kollave mattarkal, anal allah natinale tavira. Avarkalil perumpanmaiyinar (arivillata) mutarkalakave irukkinranar
